    Flex UI 만들기2

    2 분 소요

    Getting Started

    • 6. Modal
    • 7. Card List

    6. Modal

    modal.html

    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>CSS Flex</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="default.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="ui.css">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="modal">
        <div class="dialog">
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Asperiores, et. Dolor facilis architecto sunt, quis eius animi ea vel labore? Placeat, error optio amet expedita qui provident consequatur blanditiis nihil, atque, accusantium aliquid nisi eaque pariatur ratione inventore. Rerum, totam.
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>

    /* modal */
.modal {
	/* flex 설정 주고 가로축, 세로축 center */
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
	/* 배경화면을 고정 */
    position: fixed;
	/* 상하좌우 여백 0 */
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
	/* 투명도까지 설정 */
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.dialog {
    width: 50vw;
    padding: 2em;
    border-radius: 1em;
    background: white;
}



    7. Card List

    cards.html

    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <title>CSS Flex</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="default.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="ui.css">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="card-list-con">
        <ul class="card-list">
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur, ullam.
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur, ullam.
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur, ullam.
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur, ullam.
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Esse possimus, adipisci tempore hic omnis modi exercitationem eligendi recusandae repudiandae eos debitis accusantium consectetur, minus architecto, ipsa nesciunt sequi praesentium amet.
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur, ullam.
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur, ullam.
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="card-item">
                <figure class="card-image" style="background-image: url(images/cat.jpg)">
                    <img src="images/cat.jpg" alt="일분이">
                </figure>
                <div class="card-desc">
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur, ullam.
                </div>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</body>
</html>

    .card-item {
    display: flex;
    /* flex 의 메인축을 세로방향으로 설정 */
    flex-direction: column;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.card-image {
    height: 0;
    padding-bottom: 60%;
    background-color: lightgray;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center;
    background-size: cover;
}

.card-image img {
    display: none;
}

.card-desc {
    /* description 의 길이가 다르기 때문에 
    높이를 동일하게 맞춰주려면 flex-grow 를 사용 */
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    padding: 1em;
    background: white;
}

@media (min-width: 600px) {
    .card-list-con {
        /* 세로축 스크롤바만 활성화 */
		overflow-x: hidden;
	}

    .card-list {
        display: flex;
        /* flex-wrap: wrap; 크기를 벗어나면 아래행으로 이동 */
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        margin: 0 -1rem;
    }

    .card-item {
        width: 50%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
}

@media (min-width: 1200px) {
    .card-item {
        width: 33.33333%;
    }
}

    태그: CSS

    참고

    객체지향개념(변수와 메서드)

    최대 1 분 소요

    3. 변수와 메서드

    객체지향개념(객체지향언어, 클래스와 객체)

    5 분 소요

    1. 객체지향언어 1.1 객체지향언어의 역사

    쿼리 메서드 (Query Methods) 기능과 @Query

    3 분 소요

    쿼리 메서드와 JPQL(Java Persistence Query Language) 은 객체 지향 쿼리

    페이징/정렬 처리하기

    2 분 소요

    페이징 처리와 정렬은 전통적으로 SQL 을 공부하는데 반드시 필요한 부분. 특히 페이지 처리는 데이터베이스의 종류에 따라서 사용되는 기법이 다른 경우가 많아서 별도의 학습이 필요
